name: Fishermage - Wholesome Games Jam 2022
description:
The Fieldwork In Semisolid Habitats, or F.I.S.H, society has made a recent discovery: There are creatures living in semisolids, such as the ocean, swamps, and lava. That's crazy! How do they even breath down there? That's exactly what you, a humble science-mage is going to find out.

 Take your magical rod of fishery out into the environment and collect some specimens to help us understand these fantastical creatures. Help fill out the aquarium and the Fishnomicon, a book filled with all the info on each species of fish you catch.

  •  Find fishing spots in different environments, such as the ocean, bog, and volcano!
  • Name each species that you catch! Eureka!
  • Collect fish to earn scientific credits to upgrade your equipment!
  • Display all fish you catch in the aquarium so your collegues and the public can enjoy them!
  • Fill out the Fishnomicon!

Controls

WASD - Move Player/Boat
Spacebar - Catch Fish / Deliver Fish
ESC - Quit Game (Immediate)

Credits:

Art and Programming - Kartik Kini

Programming - Eric Cook

NOTICE 

This product was made for a game jam in 48 hours, and as a result, there may be some bugs, unbalanced gameplay, and incomplete features. There is currently no pausing, but your progress should save between sessions. Thank you for your understanding, and we hope you enjoy!
